about_the_game:
This pack brings together more than 50 different boss monsters from across Tyler’s various RPG Battler Packs. This pack is ideal for those who have not purchased Tyler’s other packs, but would like to have a collection of the biggest and baddest of the monsters he has made. This pack is full of the bosses only, those that are the most ferocious, dangerous, and determined to end the hero’s adventure. Each monster is presented in multiple sizes, optional filters, and pixel-style versions.

Buy now and get ready for your next boss fight!

* This pack contains content from Tyler Warrens previous packs

Features:

* 50+ Tyler Warren boss battlers, including a never-before released “Super Boss” monster
* All battlers are presented in a range of sizes from large to tiny, and recommended sizes for MV and VXACE
* All battlers are presented in optional pixel-style which includes 7 color palettes and 4 zoom sizes
* Files formatted for easy Plug and Play into RPG Maker VX Ace
* Each battler is also provided in an optional “soft-filtered” version
* Includes matching facesets for each monster

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
